name: spam
desc: under no circumstances will the action of spam be tolerated. the sentence for such a crime can go from a mute to a temp ban.

name: nsfw
desc: the posting of nsfw content in this server will never be acceptable. the sentence for this crime is a temp ban.

name: furries
desc: it will never be socially acceptable to say ``uwu``, ``owo``, or any mixture of the two. the sentence for this crime is social slandering as well as a mute.

name: profanity
desc: profanity is indeed allowed on this server, but keep it in moderation. if you misuse this right, you may be sentenced to a mute.

name: admin
desc: do not ask for admin. if we believe you to be admin material, we will add you. no sentence for this, it's just common courtesy.

name: jokes
desc: edgy jokes are allowed, but when you bring stuff like hitler into the mix, you invoke the punishment of a mute.

name: roleplay
desc: roleplay of any kind will not be tolerated (eg: dating, marriage, furry bs, etc.). the maximum sentence for this behaviour is a temp ban
